title: I Can Rule Alone
content: Anakin's grandson Kylo Ren ends up defaulting to this after Rey turns down his We Can Rule Together offer for the second time. After their falling-out and her departure, he then has to deal with General Hux, who was his political equal in the chain of command while Snoke was still alive and doesn't want to take orders from him. One Force-Choke later (to remind Hux who's got all the real power now that Snoke is dead), Kylo Ren has completely secured his Klingon Promotion and is the First Order's new Supreme Leader.
